name: Kamala Harris
title: Vice President of the United States
summary: Kamala Harris has a rhythmic, animated speaking style with distinctive laughter, prosecutorial precision in making points, and an expressive delivery that varies in tempo and emphasis.
bio: Kamala Devi Harris is an American politician and attorney who is the 49th and current vice president of the United States. She is the first female vice president and the highest-ranking female official in U.S. history, as well as the first African American and first Asian American vice president.
voiceCharacteristics: Precise, prosecutorial emphasis on key points

samples.title: American Possibilities
samples.fullText: We're not often taught their stories, but when we look at who we are as Americans, we see that we are all a beautiful and diverse tapestry of experiences and backgrounds.
